saying: Soaring through the sky takes more than a pair of wings.
description: Sandy is a normal, ostrich villager from the Animal Crossing series, making her debut in Doubutsu no Mori. After being absent in all Animal Crossing media since Doubutsu no Mori e+, Sandy made a return in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo, although she was planned to make a reappearance in Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer, but was cut for unknown reasons. Sandy also appears in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Her English name is likely a reference to the common misconception that ostriches hide their heads in the sand when frightened. Her Japanese name means "orchid."
